mapper.select: SELECT mail_file_id, send_mail_id, mail_file_name, mail_file_data, mail_file_type, mail_file_length FROM project3.mails_files WHERE mail_file_id = #{mailFileId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mails_files ( mail_file_id, send_mail_id, mail_file_name, mail_file_data, mail_file_type, mail_file_length ) VALUES ( mailfile_seq.nextval, #{sendMailId}, #{mailFileName}, #{mailFileData}, #{mailFileType}, #{mailFileLength} )
mapper.update: UPDATE project3.mails_files SET send_mail_id = #{sendMailId}, mail_file_name = #{mailFileName}, mail_file_data = #{mailFileData}, mail_file_type = #{mailFileType}, mail_file_length = #{mailFileLength} WHERE mail_file_id = #{mailFileId}
